scripts.name: db-toolkit
scripts.description: A command-line utility for streamlined database import, export, backup, and restore operations with reliable automation and minimal configuration.

scripts.name: git-record
scripts.description: A Git reporting and automation tool that generates structured reports across multiple repositories, supports CI/CD workflows, and improves development visibility.

scripts.name: vacuum
scripts.description: A lightweight system cleanup and optimization script that safely removes unnecessary files, clears caches, and enhances overall system performance.

scripts.name: scanRepo
scripts.description: A repository analysis tool for JavaScript and Node.js projects that identifies potential memory leaks, inefficient patterns, and performance bottlenecks.
